name: Tooque (GMQ 2022)
description:
A simple platformer made for https://itch.io/jam/6ames-made-quick.

Play as a small skullbird named Tooque, as he wakes up in an unfamiliar location and is tasked with saving it from crumbling to pieces and restoring it to its former glory!

Credits:

Shaun Spalding - platformer tutorial, which included the base sprites for the film grain and text box backgrounds

Insydnis - background music (https://opengameart.org/content/spelunkers-anthem-cave-theme)

spookymodem, StarNinjas - sound effects (https://opengameart.org/content/dripping-water, https://opengameart.org/content/cave-in)

thedungeonguy - creator of Nifty the Goblin (https://roodllle.tumblr.com/post/669513828447535104)
